Title: Episode 6
Plot: Sam, convinced that his life-support system is about to be switched off in his own time, convinces himself that resolving a hostage situation will allow him to wake up.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Tony Marshall (III), Noreen Kershaw, Carl Cieka, Lee Ross, Paul Copley, Debbie Howard, Ruth Millar, Margaret Henshaw, Ken Drury
